author: evenisse
msg: Fix test due to change in build controller

author: bandaram
msg: Enable Metadata tests to test columnPrivileges and tablePrivileges as part of grantRevoke test. Was previously disabled, pending code changes.
Also removed testing of defaultConnectionMode property, since this is not the way to set sqlAuthorization.

author: olegk
msg: A simple HTTP benchmark tool based on HttpClient, which implements a subset of AB (Apache Benchmark) interface

author: ekoneil
msg: Remove the use of a PageFlowContext thread local that is *very* useful and needs to come back but is currently leaking ServletRequest, ServletResponse, and ServletContext to threads that aren't used to handle requests to NetUI enabled webapps.

author: djd
msg: DERBY-1095 (partial) Once a ContextManager is empty no longer maintain a reference
to it in the thread local variable. Avoids a thread hanging onto memory for ever.
